alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by heavy rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following county, Cascade. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 704 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. A quick one half to inch of rain may occur in less than 30 minutes if located directly under thunderstorms moving through the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Great Falls, Sand Coulee, Tracy, Centerville and Malmstrom Afb. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
